declarations.name: TButton
declarations.description: Class representing the custom element t-button.

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: Defines how the ShadowDOM should behave.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Defines the button's visual style.

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description: Defines the button's shape.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the button.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Defines the button type.

attributes.name: buttonClass
attributes.description: Custom class for the button.

declarations.name: TConsole
declarations.description: A console-like element for displaying code snippets.

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: Defines how the ShadowDOM should behave.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Defines the visual style of the console.

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Defines how the ShadowDOM should behave.

declarations.name: TInput
declarations.description: Class representing the custom element t-input.

members.name: constructor
members.description: Creates an instance of TInput and initializes the shadow DOM.

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: Defines how the ShadowDOM should behave.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Defines the color variant of the input.

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description: Defines the shape of the input.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Specifies the input type.
attributes.type: text | password | email | number | search | tel | url | checkbox | radio | date | time | datetime-local | month | week | color | file | hidden

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Specifies the name of the input.

attributes.name: minLength
attributes.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters.

attributes.name: maxLength
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Defines a placeholder text.

attributes.name: inputClass
attributes.description: CSS class for the input element.

attributes.name: labelText
attributes.description: Text for the label element.

attributes.name: labelClass
attributes.description: CSS class for the label element.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Marks the input as required.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the input field.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Marks the input as checked (for checkboxes and radios).

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Defines the color variant of the input.

properties.name: shape
properties.description: Defines the shape of the input.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Specifies the name of the input.

properties.name: minlength
properties.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters.

properties.name: maxlength
properties.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters.

properties.name: inputClass
properties.description: CSS class for the input element.

properties.name: labelClass
properties.description: CSS class for the label element.

properties.name: checked
properties.description: Marks the input as checked (for checkboxes and radios).

attributes.name: variant
